name: Cyberdimension Neptunia: 4 Goddesses Online - White Heart Hair Tie
detailed_description:
White Heart Hair Tie will be added to your item inventory.

An accessory used by the goddess of Alsgard.

*After installation of the DLC access the "DLC" option on the title screen to turn the purchased DLC to "ON".

1. Start "Cyberdimension Neptunia: 4 Goddesses Online"
2. In "DLC" enable "ON" for the new DLCs
3. Load a save file
4. Enter the World Map
5. Enter a dungeon
6. Open the Menu
7. Select "Customize"
8. Under Accessories, select a slot
9. Scroll down to the bottom for the 9 new DLCs
10. Select from White Heart Hair Tie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Corei7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series, AMD processor may not work properly with this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Corei7-3770
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series, AMD processor may not work properly with this game.
